Private Sub GetValue(ByRef value As Long) value = 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.DeclareAsExplicitVariantQuickFix
member.summary: Adds an explicit Variant data type to an implicitly typed declaration. Note: a more specific data type might be more appropriate.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value value = Sheet1.Range("A1").Value Debug.Print TypeName(value) End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Variant value = Sheet1.Range("A1").Value Debug.Print TypeName(value) End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.EncapsulateFieldQuickFix
member.summary: Runs the 'Encapsulate Field' refactoring, which prompts for identifier names for the new property and its value parameter.

example.before: Option Explicit Public SomeValue As Long
example.after:
Option Explicit Private SomeValue As Long
Public Property Get SomeProperty() As Long SomeProperty = SomeValue End Property
Public Property Let SomeProperty(ByVal value As Long) SomeValue = value End Property

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.IgnoreOnceQuickFix
member.summary: Adds an '@Ignore annotation to ignore a specific inspection result. Applicable to all inspections whose results can be annotated in a module.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long value = 42 Debug.Print 42 End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething() '@Ignore VariableNotUsed Dim value As Long value = 42 Debug.Print 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.IntroduceLocalVariableQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces a local Variant variable for an otherwise undeclared identifier.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething() value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Variant value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.IsMissingOnInappropriateArgumentQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces misuses of the IsMissing function with the appropriate default value for the specified parameter type.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Date) If Not IsMissing(value) Then Debug.Print value End If End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Date) If Not value = CDate(0) Then Debug.Print value End If End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.MakeSingleLineParameterQuickFix
member.summary: Rewrites a parameter declaration that is split across multiple lines.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value _ As Long) End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Long) End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.MoveFieldCloserToUsageQuickFix
member.summary: Moves field declaration to the procedure scope it's used in.

example.before:
Option Explicit Private value As Long
Public Sub DoSomething() value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.OptionExplicitQuickFix
member.summary: Adds 'Option Explicit' to the top of code modules.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print 42 End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.PassParameterByReferenceQuickFix
member.summary: Modifies a parameter to be passed by reference.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Long) value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething(ByRef value As Long) value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.PassParameterByValueQuickFix
member.summary: Modifies a parameter to be passed by value.

example.before: Public Sub DoSomething(ByRef value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after: Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveAnnotationQuickFix
member.summary: Removes an annotation comment representing a hidden module or member attribute, in order to maintain consistency between hidden attributes and annotation comments.

example.before:
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = False '@PredeclaredId
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() End Sub
example.after:
Attribute VB_PredeclaredId = False
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveAttributeQuickFix
member.summary: Removes a hidden attribute, in order to maintain consistency between hidden attributes and (missing) annotation comments.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Attribute VB_UserMemId = 0
End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething()
End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveCommentQuickFix
member.summary: Removes a comment.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Rem does something End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething()
End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveDuplicatedAnnotationQuickFix
member.summary: Removes a duplicated annotation comment.

example.before:
Option Explicit
'@Obsolete '@Obsolete Public Sub DoSomething() End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
'@Obsolete Public Sub DoSomething() End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveEmptyElseBlockQuickFix
member.summary: Removes an empty Else block.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If Application.Calculation = xlCalculationAutomatic Then Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual Else End If End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If Application.Calculation = xlCalculationAutomatic Then Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual End If End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveEmptyIfBlockQuickFix
member.summary: Removes an empty conditional block by inverting the condition expression.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual Then Else Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual End If '... End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If Application.Calculation <> xlCalculationManual Then
Application.Calculation = xlCalculationManual End If '... End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveExplicitByRefModifierQuickFix
member.summary: Removes an explicit ByRef modifier, making it implicit.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(ByRef value As Long) '... End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(value As Long) '... End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveExplicitCallStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Makes a call statement implicit by removing the 'Call' keyword, adjusting argument list parentheses accordingly.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Call DoSomethingElse(42) End Sub
Private Sub DoSomethingElse(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() DoSomethingElse 42 End Sub
Private Sub DoSomethingElse(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveExplicitLetStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Makes the 'Let' keyword of a value assignment implicit.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long Let value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long value = 42 Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveLocalErrorQuickFix
member.summary: Makes the 'Local' keyword of an 'On Error' statement implicit.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() On Local Error GoTo CleanFail Debug.Print 42 / 0 CleanExit: Exit Sub CleanFail: Debug.Print Err.Description Resume CleanExit End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() On Error GoTo CleanFail Debug.Print 42 / 0 CleanExit: Exit Sub CleanFail: Debug.Print Err.Description Resume CleanExit End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveOptionBaseStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Removes 'Option Base 0' statement from a module, making it implicit (0 being the default implicit lower bound for implicitly-sized arrays).

example.before:
Option Explicit Option Base 0
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim values(10) ' implicit lower bound is 0 Debug.Print LBound(values), UBound(values) End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim values(10) ' implicit lower bound is 0 Debug.Print LBound(values), UBound(values) End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveStepOneQuickFix
member.summary: Removes 'Step 1' specifier from 'For...Next' loop statement, 1 being the implicit default 'Step' increment.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim i As Long For i = 1 To 10 Step 1 Debug.Print i Next End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim i As Long For i = 1 To 10 Debug.Print i Next End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveStopKeywordQuickFix
member.summary: Removes 'Stop' instruction.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() MsgBox "Hi" Stop End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() MsgBox "Hi"
End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveTypeHintsQuickFix
member.summary: Removes type hint characters from identifier declarations and value literals.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim message$ message$ = "Hi" MsgBox message$ End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim message As String message = "Hi" MsgBox message End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveUnassignedIdentifierQuickFix
member.summary: Removes the declaration for a variable that is never assigned. This operation may result in broken code if the unassigned variable is in use.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveUnassignedVariableUsageQuickFix
member.summary: Removes an instruction that references a variable that isn't assigned. This operation may break the code.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long
End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveUnusedDeclarationQuickFix
member.summary: Removes the declaration for a constant, variable, procedure, or line label that isn't used. This operation can break the code if the declaration is actually in use but Rubberduck couldn't find where.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Const value = 42 Debug.Print 42 End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething()
Debug.Print 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RemoveUnusedParameterQuickFix
member.summary: Refactors a procedure's signature to remove a parameter that isn't used. Also updates usages.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() DoSomethingElse 42 End Sub
Private Sub DoSomethingElse(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print 42 End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() DoSomethingElse End Sub
Private Sub DoSomethingElse() Debug.Print 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RenameDeclarationQuickFix
member.summary: Prompts for a new name, renames a declaration accordingly, and updates all usages.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() A1 End Sub
Public Sub A1(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Renamed End Sub
Public Sub Renamed(ByVal value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.ReplaceEmptyStringLiteralStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces empty string literals '""' with the 'vbNullString' constant.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If ActiveCell.Text = "" Then Debug.Print ActiveCell.Address End If End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() If ActiveCell.Text = vbNullString Then Debug.Print ActiveCell.Address End If End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.ReplaceGlobalModifierQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces 'Global' access modifier with the equivalent 'Public' keyword.

example.before: Option Explicit Global Something As Long
example.after: Option Explicit Public Something As Long

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.ReplaceIfElseWithConditionalStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Simplifies conditional Boolean literal assignments with a direct assignment to the conditional expression.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Long) Dim result As Boolean If value > 10 Then result = True Else result = False End If Debug.Print result End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(ByVal value As Long) Dim result As Boolean result = value > 10 Debug.Print result End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.ReplaceObsoleteCommentMarkerQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces the obsolete 'Rem' comment marker token with a single quote character.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Rem some comment... End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() ' some comment... End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.ReplaceObsoleteErrorStatementQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces the obsolete 'Error' statement with an 'ErrObject.Raise' member call.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Error 5 End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Err.Raise 5 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.RestoreErrorHandlingQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces an error-handling subroutine to ensure error state is properly handled on scope exit.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() On Error Resume Next Debug.Print ActiveWorkbook.FullName End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() On Error GoTo ErrHandler Debug.Print ActiveWorkbook.FullName Exit Sub ErrHandler: If Err.Number > 0 Then 'TODO: handle specific error Err.Clear Resume Next End If End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.SetExplicitVariantReturnTypeQuickFix
member.summary: Declares an explicit Variant return type for a procedure that implicitly returns a Variant.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Function WorksheetErrorValueNA() WorksheetErrorValueNA = CVErr(xlErrNA) End Function
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Function WorksheetErrorValueNA() As Variant WorksheetErrorValueNA = CVErr(xlErrNA) End Function

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.SpecifyExplicitByRefModifierQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces an explicit 'ByRef' modifier for a parameter that is implicitly passed by reference.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething(ByRef value As Long) Debug.Print value End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.SpecifyExplicitPublicModifierQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces an explicit 'Public' access modifier for a procedure that is implicitly public.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print 42 End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print 42 End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.SplitMultipleDeclarationsQuickFix
member.summary: Splits multiple declarations into separate statements.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long, something As String '... End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim value As Long Dim something As String '... End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.UntypedFunctionUsageQuickFix
member.summary: Replaces the use of a Variant-returning standard library function with its String-returning equivalent. Using this when the argument can be 'Null' will break the code.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print Format(VBA.DateTime.Date, "yyyy-MM-dd") End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Debug.Print Format$(VBA.DateTime.Date, "yyyy-MM-dd") End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.UseSetKeywordForObjectAssignmentQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces a 'Set' keyword for what appears to be a suspicious or malformed object reference assignment.

example.before:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim c As VBA.Collection c = New VBA.Collection End Sub
example.after:
Option Explicit
Public Sub DoSomething() Dim c As VBA.Collection Set c = New VBA.Collection End Sub

member.name: T:Rubberduck.Inspections.QuickFixes.WriteOnlyPropertyQuickFix
member.summary: Introduces a 'Property Get' member to make a write-only property read/write; Rubberduck will not infer the property's backing field, the body of the new member must be implemented manually.

example.before:
Option Explicit Private internalValue As Long
Public Property Let Something(ByVal value As Long) internalValue = value End Property
example.after:
Option Explicit Private internalValue As Long
Public Property Get Something() As Long End Property
Public Property Let Something(ByVal value As Long) internalValue = value End Property
